long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VOXCIE connects people around common interests (websitesâ€™ content) and empowers them to freely share their views and experiences through open discussions directly above any website.

VOXCIE brings public relations content and unfiltered opinions together. 

The app offers a login via Facebook and it does NOT receive any other data besides your chosen login name and picture (common to other uses when you use Facebook to login.)  The app does NOT read or track your browsing history (it only displays the URL of the site where users post comments.)
